name: car code
description: This is a simple API that will return the human readable version of DTC codes (OBD-II Trouble Codes).

api_methods.name: /obd2/{code}
api_methods.description: This endpoint will provide the human readable version of a requested obd2 code

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me what the error code P0420 means for my Toyota Camry?
I just got a P0171 code on my dashboard—what does that indicate?
Explain the meaning of code P0302 that appeared after my car started misfiring.
What is the description for the OBD-II code P0455?
Decode P0128 for me; I saw it during my last vehicle scan.
I noticed a P0446 code on my Honda Accord—what does this code stand for?
Give me the human-readable explanation for code P0340.
What does P0113 mean? My mechanic mentioned it during the inspection.
Could you clarify the issue indicated by code P0507?
I received a P0700 code after my transmission warning light came on—what does this code represent?
